channel.title: Employment
channel.description:
So I'm job hunting for my first job and im on several fast food website likes taco bell, McDonalds, etc. They have the option for me to upload a resume. So can anyone link me to a good resume for Ms Word? ++REP.
Also yes i could find one off google but alot of you here are older and more experienced with jobs so one of you might be able to find me a good one with important info on it and stuff, something that appeals to people.
Thanks, Eric

item.title: Employment
item.dc:creator: @m1lkman m1lkman
item.description:
@m1lkman wrote:

Best Buy isn’t all about selling computers. Some people gotsa put them heavy & expensive cpus on the shelves.

Read full topic

item.title: Employment
item.dc:creator: @Andrew_Ferguson The317Guy
item.description:
@Andrew_Ferguson wrote:

[quote=“tyb97, post:36, topic:415791”][quote author=m.dog311 link=topic=517734.msg3762465#msg3762465 date=1316976967]

I would never work somewhere as degrading as a fast foot restaurant. My ass is working at cvs or best buy.

Pretty genius idea here, think about it, Your into computers obviously therefore you know about electronics, so why not an electronic store! And the best part is you earn commission,

except you have to be 18 to work there…

Nope.
[/quote]
I think it depends on state.[/quote]
Yeah the one near me I worked at at 15 (with that early work paper thing “forgot name”)

Read full topic

put fake names down, they never call anyways.

item.title: Employment
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

Your first resume sucks since you have no experience. I didn’t know what to say on mine, since there was nothing to be said. So it only included a goal, my education, volunteer experience, and some of the land work I would do for my grandpa (chainsaws etc). I was maybe 14-15 not sure.

Make it simple, and neat. Perfect spelling. Then after you make sure you do this, you can be assured your resume still means nothing. When you speak to them in person is the true impression.

Read full topic

item.title: Employment
item.dc:creator: @eballer48 eballer48
item.description:
@eballer48 wrote:

[quote=“m.dog311, post:17, topic:415791”][quote author=eballer48 link=topic=517734.msg3761043#msg3761043 date=1316880839]
Okay ive come to the ‘Reference’ Part i need two of them but i havent really done shit for anyone idk what to put?
[/quote]
If you know people who work there, ask them if you can use them as references. If not, use family members (preferably w/ different last names) and tell them you used them. But as mona lisa said, they almost never call.[/quote]

Thanks man

Read full topic

item.title: Employment
item.dc:creator: @m.dog311 m.dog311
item.description:
@m.dog311 wrote:

eballer48:

Okay ive come to the ‘Reference’ Part i need two of them but i havent really done shit for anyone idk what to put?

If you know people who work there, ask them if you can use them as references. If not, use family members (preferably w/ different last names) and tell them you used them. But as mona lisa said, they almost never call.

Read full topic
